code: import PlayerInfo from'./player_info';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{toggleLike as _toggleLike}from'../../actions/song_actions';import{fetchUser as _fetchUser}from'../../actions/user_actions';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{currentTrack:state.queue[0],tracks:state.queue,nextTrack:state.queue[1],currentUserId:state.session.user.id,currentUser:state.entities.users[state.session.user.id]};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{toggleLike:function toggleLike(likeData){return dispatch(_toggleLike(likeData));},fetchUser:function fetchUser(id){return dispatch(_fetchUser(id));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(PlayerInfo);
